entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Chilliwack
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Agassiz 09:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -11.7°C
Wind: NE 49 km/h gust 70 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with ice pellets early this afternoon. Blowing snow this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Agassiz this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of ice pellets or freezing rain this evening. Periods of freezing rain beginning near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near Agassiz. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain at times heavy changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Rainfall amount 30 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near Agassiz in the morning. Wind becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
